bibl.title: Gods and Men in Egypt. 3000 BCE to 395 CE. Translated from the French by David LORTON.
bibl.note: Éd. originale: Dieux et hommes en Égypte, 3000 av. J.-C. - 395 apr. J.-C. Anthropologie religieuse = U-Histoire ancienne (Paris, 1991).
bibl.seg: DUNAND Françoise and Christiane ZIVIE-COCHE, Gods and Men in Egypt. 3000 BCE to 395 CE. Translated from the French by David LORTON.
Ithaca, New York, Cornell University Press, 2004, 8°, 367 pp. ISBN 0-8014-8853-2. $25.95.
Éd. originale: Dieux et hommes en Égypte, 3000 av. J.-C. - 395 apr. J.-C. Anthropologie religieuse = U-Histoire ancienne (Paris, 1991).
C.R. par Mehmet-Ali Ataç, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2005/2005-07-71.html >. - Eugene Cruz-Uribe, JNES 67 (2008) pp. 133-134.
